title: 3-hour power cuts for 21st & 22nd April – PUCSL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The CEB will impose a 3 hours & 20 minutes power cut due to unavailability of fuel for thermal power plants for 21st & 22nd April.
Cardinal condemns Rambukkana shooting; warns of unscrupulous parties trying to set up one against the other
Over 300 apparel workers hospitalized over a suspected case of food poisoning
#Rambukkana Shooting : impartial & transparent inquiry will be carried out, tweets President
